- term: 0
  synonyms: zero,nought,cipher,cypher
- term: 1
  synonyms: one,ane,ace,single,unity
- term: 10
  synonyms: ten,tenner,decade
- term: 100
  synonyms: hundred,one hundred,hundred,century,one c,centred
- term: 1000
  synonyms: thousand,one thousand,one thousand,chiliad,g,grand,thou,yard
- term: 10000
  synonyms: ten thousand,myriad
- term: 100000
  synonyms: hundred thousand,lakh
